publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-861 Mr Jack McConnell: Education and Training (Scotland) Bill - Finance—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Education and Training (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of the expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act.
